faq.question: How accurate is the OCR?
faq.answer: Our OCR achieves 98%+ accuracy on high-quality scans and 90%+ on low-quality or handwritten documents. Quality improves with better source images.

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: Upload scanned PDFs, JPG, PNG, TIFF, or any common image format. We handle all of them.

faq.question: Does it work with handwritten documents?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI can recognize printed and handwritten text. Handwriting recognition works best with clear, legible writing (Pro plans).

faq.question: Can it handle documents in different languages?
faq.answer: Absolutely. OCR supports 50+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, and more.

faq.question: Does OCR cost extra?
faq.answer: OCR is included in all plans! No extra charges for processing scanned documents.

faq.question: How long does OCR processing take?
faq.answer: Typically 30-60 seconds for standard documents. Large or complex documents may take 2-3 minutes.

faq.question: Can I edit the extracted text?
faq.answer: Yes! View and edit extracted text before generating summaries. Fix any OCR errors or make corrections (Starter plans and above).
